page.title: 10Farming Dairy Farming
page.content: At{Castle Folds Farm}there are{24 {Friesian cows}one of which can cost{ {Â£500 to Â£600.}Ever since he left school the farmer has milked cows,at first by hand but now by machine.He has six stands in his milking parlour and each cow takes about three minutes to be milked.A cow can give on average {four gallons}of milk each day but when newly calved it could give{eight.}All his milk goes to Northern Dairies where it is processed.The farmer is paid{14.5p per litre}the retailer sells it at{23p per pint.}There is no bull at the farm, they use artificial insemination.At the end of this year the farmer is going out of dairy farming and into beef because the Milk Marketing Board has fixed a quota for all dairy farmers and this farmer said it wasn't enough to make a profit.
